attributes.action: SCRAP THE TV LICENSE AND MAKE THE BBC PLAY HIGHE END ADDS
attributes.additional_details: In this time of penny pinching and financial pressure should we continue paying for a tv license when we are switching 2 digital and the original purposes of the license was 2 pay fore the up keep of analoge signal is'nt it time that the bbc find a nuther way 2 finance its self many by pouting high end adds on
